title: User Login with Multi-Factor Authentication
description: As a customer, I want to login using multi-factor authentication, so that my account access remains secure.
attributes_and_rules: Include password-based access, one-time passwords, and token options.
acceptance_criteria: 1. User must provide a password and a second factor (OTP or token).
test_cases: Given a user has registered, When they enter their password and OTP, Then they should be logged in securely.

title: Session Timeout Mechanism
description: As a user, I want my session to timeout after a period of inactivity, so that my account remains protected if I forget to logout.
acceptance_criteria: 1. User’s session should automatically timeout after a set period of inactivity.
test_cases: Given a user is logged in, When they are inactive for the session duration, Then they should be logged out automatically.

title: Desktop, Mobile, and Tablet Compatibility
description: As a user, I want to have a consistent experience across desktop, mobile, and tablet, so that I can conveniently access services.
attributes_and_rules: Use responsive design techniques to adjust layout.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The UI should adapt seamlessly to different screen sizes.
test_cases: Given different devices, When the user accesses the portal, Then the layout should adjust and remain usable.

title: Accessibility Compliance
description: As a user with disabilities, I want the interface to comply with WCAG guidelines, so that I can have a smooth experience.
attributes_and_rules: Ensure all accessibility guidelines (WCAG) are followed.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The portal must pass accessibility compliance tests.
test_cases: Given a user with disabilities, When they use the portal, Then it should meet WCAG standards.

title: Dynamic Dashboard Content
description: As a customer, I want my dashboard to display personalized content, so that I can see relevant information and offers.
attributes_and_rules: Fetch data based on user profile and eligibility.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The dashboard must display content tailored to the user’s profile.
test_cases: Given a logged-in user, When they view their dashboard, Then it should show personalized services and information.

epic_title: Digital Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Online Account Opening Process
description: As a potential customer, I want to open a new account online, so that I do not have to visit a branch.
attributes_and_rules: Include guided forms and validation steps.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users should be able to complete an online account opening process end-to-end.
test_cases: Given a potential customer, When they fill out the account opening form, Then the application should be processed online.

title: Save and Resume Applications
description: As a customer, I want to save my incomplete applications and resume later, so that I can complete it at my convenience.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users should be able to save incomplete applications and resume them later.
test_cases: Given an incomplete application, When the user saves it, Then they should be able to resume later from the last saved point.

title: Secure Document Upload
description: As a customer, I want to securely upload documents for verification, so that my information is protected during the process.
attributes_and_rules: Ensure file encryption and format validation.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Uploaded documents should be encrypted and validated.
test_cases: Given a customer, When they upload a document, Then it should be encrypted and validated for formats.

title: Service Request Tracking
description: As a customer, I want to track my service requests in real time, so that I am informed about the status of my requests.
attributes_and_rules: Display progress stages and send notifications.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Real-time tracking information should be displayed for service requests.
test_cases: Given a service request, When the status changes, Then the progress should be updated real-time.

title: View Interaction History
description: As a customer, I want to view my history of interactions, so that I can keep track of my activities within the portal.
attributes_and_rules: Capture and display all user interactions.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users should be able to view their complete interaction history.
test_cases: Given a user interaction, When it occurs, Then it should be logged and retrievable.

title: Real-Time Core Banking Data Synchronization
description: As a system, I want to synchronize with the core banking system, so that customer data and requests are updated in real time.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Data updates and service requests should be synchronized in real time.
test_cases: Given a data update, When it occurs, Then it should be synchronized with the core banking system immediately.

title: Develop High-Performance Database
description: As a system, I want an independent database, so that the portal's performance is optimized and reliable.
attributes_and_rules: Utilize efficient data modeling and caching strategies.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The database should provide fast load times and high reliability.
test_cases: Given varying traffic conditions, When the portal is used, Then it should remain performant and reliable.

epic_title: Role-Based Access Control and Authorization Framework
title: User Access Control by Role
description: As an administrator, I want to manage user access based on roles, so that security policies are enforced.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users should have access only within their authorized capacity.
test_cases: Given a user role, When access is attempted, Then it should be allowed or denied according to the role.
